 # Add video management and playback with statistics
 Labels: enhancement,priority:low

Description
-----------
Enable teachers to upload instructional videos, and allow students to view, like, and comment. Track metrics like views and likes.

Acceptance criteria
-------------------
- Video upload endpoint and storage (local or cloud).
- Video metadata model (title, description, uploader, views, likes).
- Playback page and ability to comment/like.
- Basic stats page showing top videos.

Tasks
-----
- Implement upload endpoint and file storage plan.
- Add frontend playback page and metadata display.
- Track view and like counts in DB.
